entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0156.10079] The filer has reported a value of 33,155,669 using the extension concept bway:WeightedAverageSharesBasicAndDilutedNetProfit. This value should be tagged with separate IFRS elements for the Basic amount and the diluted amount. This means the same fact needs to be tagged with separate elements. An extension element should not be used to tag this fact if equivalent basic and diluted elements exist in the taxonomy.
The properties of this bway:WeightedAverageSharesBasicAndDilutedNetProfit fact are:
Period :2023-01-01 to 2023-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : shares
